original_text: Some seeds fell on ground with rocks in it. This is like people who hear the message from God and they are very happy for a time. But they are like plants that have not grown down well into the soil. They believe in God for a short time. But when they have problems, they stop believing.
korean_text: 바위 위에 있다는 것은 말씀을 들을 때에 기쁨으로 받으나 뿌리가 없어 잠깐 믿다가 시련을 당할 때에 배반하는 자요

sentences.original_text: Some seeds fell on ground with rocks in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 씨앗들이 돌이 있는 땅에 떨어졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: This is like people who hear the message from God
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 하나님의 말씀을 듣는 사람들과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: and they are very happy for a time.
that have not grown down well into the soil.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 흙 속으로 잘 뿌리내리지 못했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They believe in God for a short time.
